string-array.name: question_theme1_easy
string-array.item: You are participating in a race. You overtake the second person. What position do you finish?
If you overtake the last person, then you arrive...?
Take 1000 and add:40+1000+30+1000+20+1000+and 10. What is the total?
Some months have 31 days; how many have 28?
Why cant a man living in the USA be buried in Canada?

string-array.name: question_theme1_medium
string-array.item: Is it legal for a man in California to marry his widows sister? Why?
Divide 30 by 1/2 and add 10. What is the answer?
A man builds a house rectangular in shape. All sides have southern exposure. A big bear walks by, what color is the bear? Why?
If there are 3 apples and you take away 2, how many do you have?
How far can a dog run into the woods?

string-array.name: question_theme1_hard
string-array.item: How many animals of each sex did Moses take on the ark?
A clerk in the butcher shop is 5 feet 10 inch tall. What does he weigh?
How many two cent stamps are there in a dozen?

string-array.name: question_theme2_easy
string-array.item: Look at this series: 2, 1, (1/2), (1/4), ... What number should come next?
Look at this series: 7, 10, 8, 11, 9, 12, ... What number should come next?
Look at this series: 36, 34, 30, 28, 24, ... What number should come next?
Look at this series: 22, 21, 23, 22, 24, 23, ... What number should come next?
Look at this series: 53, 53, 40, 40, 27, 27, ... What number should come next?

string-array.name: question_theme2_hard
string-array.item: Look at this series: F2, __, D8, C16, B32, ... What number should fill the blank?
Look at this series: 664, 332, 340, 170, ____, 89, ... What number should fill the blank?
Look at this series: V, VIII, XI, XIV, __, XX, ... What number should fill the blank?
Look at this series: 70, 71, 76, __, 81, 86, 70, 91, ... What number should fill the blank?
Look at this series: 8, 43, 11, 41, __, 39, 17, ... What number should fill in the blank?

string-array.name: question_theme3_easy
string-array.item: Which of the following numbers is equivalent to 6*(1/2)?
Take 1000 and add:40+1000+30+1000+20+1000+and 10. What is the total?
Which of the following is equivalent to 35/30
In a container there are 8 yellow buttons. If 2 yellow buttons are removed from the container, what percentage of the original number of yellow buttons remain in the container?

string-array.name: question_theme3_medium
string-array.item: There are 14 finalists in a sports meet. In how many ways can you select, the winner and the runner-up?
In a class of 75 students, 35 have PC, 25 have Mac and 5 have both PC and Mac. How many students have neither PC nor Mac?
The regular price for a television is $1900. At a sale, Ben bought the television at a discount of 25%. What was the amount of discount that Ben got for the television?
Tom has 7 times as many crayons as Dick and 3 times as many as Harry. If Dick has less than 21 crayons, what is the maximum number of crayons that Tom can have?
What is the smallest prime factor of 1001?

string-array.name: question_theme3_hard
string-array.item: The arithmetic mean (average) of 3, 5, 7 and y is 100. What is the value of y?
A quiz consists of true and false questions.The ratio of the number of true questions to the number of false questions is 4:3.About what percent of the questions are not true
A cars price decreased by 20% from 1998 to 2000. If the price of the car was P dollars in 2000, what was it in 1998

string-array.name: answer_theme1_medium
string-array.item: He can, he has the right to do 2 marriages

string-array.name: answer_theme1_hard
string-array.item: Bugs that live in the dust

string-array.name: solution_theme1_hard
string-array.item: Bugs that live in the dust

string-array.name: hints_theme1_easy
string-array.item: Do you think of a Leap Year?
Dont burry him, he is alive..

string-array.item: He can run in and run out
